title: 这个指令哪里错了？
author: kid小东
txt_content:
/summon Zombie -1073 4 -513 {CustomName:"小喽喽",{Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000},
{Name:generic.followRange,Base:250},
{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1.0},
{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100}]}
{Equipment:[{id:137,Count:6},{id:24,Count:5},{id:5,Damage:4,Count:8},{id:20,Count:5},{id:133,Count:20}],
DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F]}
大神帮忙看看这个指令到底是哪里错了..

replies.author: lrf8643
replies.txt_content:
lrf8643 发表于 2016-12-25 17:44
建议你用这个软/件来做。比较方便。也不容易出错。
 [1.4-1.11]「原版指令」MCH v2.8.6.4 —— 麻麻再也 ...
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:minecraft:command_block,Count:6b,Damage:0s},{},{id:minecraft:planks,Count:8b,Damage:4s},{id:minecraft:glass,Count:5b,Damage:0s},{id:minecraft:emerald_block,Count:20b,Damage:0s}],DropChances:[1F,1F,1F,1F,1F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.followRange,Base:250d},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000d},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:1d},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1d}],CustomName:"小喽啰",CustomNameVisible:1}

这就是你要得指令了。出了头盔和手。其他部位的方块都不会显示。
这是一只头顶绿宝石块，手拿命令方块的僵尸。
由于没有id24的物品，所以掉落物是这些。

replies.author: lrf8643
replies.txt_content:
单位单位。说了多少遍单位的重要性了。
Base:233d
Count:233b
Damage:233s
单位不加肯定不行。然后你的版本是多少
